title: To Kill A Unicorn - Novel Updates

description: Gladiator Warrior Hamza the Lion, was sold to a lord. The lord, in order to get Hamza ready, sends him to the red-light district Boss, Anes, to learn the ins and outs of pleasing one’s master. But these two don’t realize what they have gotten themselves into.>
